hero.title: matbakh.app Intelligence Report
hero.subtitle: Our AI analysis combines Google and social media data for a holistic performance score.

kpi.impressionsDesc: Total impressions of your Google profile in search & maps
kpi.ctrDesc: Ratio of clicks to impressions, displayed as percentage
kpi.profileViewsDesc: Number of direct views of your Google Business Profile
kpi.callsDesc: Number of calls via your Google Business Profile
kpi.websiteClicksDesc: Clicks on the website link in your Google profile
kpi.directionsRequestsDesc: Number of direction requests to your location
kpi.photoViewsDesc: Views of your photos in the Google profile
kpi.postViewsDesc: Views of your Google Posts (updates, offers, events)
kpi.bounceRateDesc: Percentage of visitors who leave after viewing only one page
kpi.avgSessionDurationDesc: Average time users spend on your website
kpi.conversionsDesc: Number of completed target actions (bookings, contact, etc.)
kpi.conversionRateDesc: Percentage of visitors who perform a desired action
kpi.returningUsersDesc: Number of users who have visited the website before

sidebar.visibilityTip: Add more photos to increase your visibility
